body_html:
@serendipity24

hi

Thanks for answering, as u can see below, i trained and freezed the model with the sample parameters.
The fact at the moment is that if u change the duration from 1000ms to any other value
the system crash on the freeze with the message

Assign requires shapes of both tensors to match

python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/train.py --data_dir=/notebooks/yesdb/
--wanted_words=yes
--how_many_training_steps=100,100 --learning_rate=0.001,0.0001
--train_dir=/notebooks/yesmodel
--summaries_dir=/notebooks/yesmodellog
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20

python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/freeze.py
--wanted_words=yes
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20
--start_checkpoint=/notebooks/yesmodel/conv.ckpt-100
--output_file=/notebooks/yesmodel/conv_frozen.pb
body_text:
@serendipity24
hi
Thanks for answering, as u can see below, i trained and freezed the model with the sample parameters.
The fact at the moment is that if u change the duration from 1000ms to any other value
the system crash on the freeze with the message
Assign requires shapes of both tensors to match
python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/train.py --data_dir=/notebooks/yesdb/ 
--wanted_words=yes 
--how_many_training_steps=100,100 --learning_rate=0.001,0.0001  
--train_dir=/notebooks/yesmodel 
--summaries_dir=/notebooks/yesmodellog
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20
python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/freeze.py 
--wanted_words=yes 
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20 
--start_checkpoint=/notebooks/yesmodel/conv.ckpt-100 
--output_file=/notebooks/yesmodel/conv_frozen.pb
body:
@serendipity24 

hi

Thanks for answering, as u can see below, i trained and freezed the model with the sample parameters.
The fact at the moment is that if u change the duration from 1000ms to any other value
the system crash on the freeze with the message

**Assign requires shapes of both tensors to match**

python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/train.py --data_dir=/notebooks/yesdb/ \
--wanted_words=yes \
--how_many_training_steps=100,100 --learning_rate=0.001,0.0001  \
--train_dir=/notebooks/yesmodel \
--summaries_dir=/notebooks/yesmodellog
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20


python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/freeze.py \
--wanted_words=yes \
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20 \
--start_checkpoint=/notebooks/yesmodel/conv.ckpt-100 \
--output_file=/notebooks/yesmodel/conv_frozen.pb
